description: Analyzer for BR-04 Palm Certification Compliance

Supplier.description: Supplier/company issuing the palm compliance declaration (header/signature block).

MaterialName.description: Material or product name covered by the declaration.

MaterialCode.description: Supplier/internal identifier for the material, if present.

ContainsPalmDerived.description: True if the document states that the material contains palm/palm kernel-derived substances; False if it explicitly states none or 'Not Applicable'.

RSPOCategory.description: Declared RSPO supply chain category for palm inputs where applicable (e.g., 'Identity Preserved', 'Segregated', 'Mass Balance', or 'Not Applicable'). Use the exact term printed.
